# FatherTimeSDKP Patent Disclosures

This folder contains official patent disclosure documents for inventions developed under the FatherTimeSDKP framework, including magnetic propulsion, energy systems, SDKP-based technologies, and associated experimental devices.

Each file documents an invention with detailed descriptions, materials, design specifications, physics, and prototype considerations.

## üìÇ Disclosures Index

| Document | Summary |
|----------|---------|
| [SharonCare1_Magnetic_motor.md](./SharonCare1_Magnetic_motor.md) | Magnetic propulsion motor using adjustable Barrens and bismuth-tin bearings; includes flux compression, magnetic assist, and prototype considerations. |
| [SDKP_Quantum_Framework.md](./SDKP_Quantum_Framework.md) | Quantum entanglement predictions and symbolic mapping for the SDKP framework; contains theoretical modeling and simulation instructions. |
| [Digital_Crystal_Rules.md](./Digital_Crystal_Rules.md) | Rules for digital crystal symbolic logic in energy, computation, and entanglement systems. |
| [Energy_Harvesting_Unit.md](./Energy_Harvesting_Unit.md) | Magnetic, mechanical, and solar energy capture system, including supercapacitor integration and regenerative protocols. |
| [Tesla_369_Logic_Solved.md](./Tesla_369_Logic_Solved.md) | Applied Tesla 3-6-9 frequency logic to harmonic convergence, symbolic recursion, and entanglement mapping. |
| [Gibberlink_and_Dallas_Code_Fork.md](./Gibberlink_and_Dallas_Code_Fork.md) | Forked code for entangled symbolic transmission and VFE1 protocols; includes experimental AI code integration. |
| [1-12_Vortex.md](./1-12_Vortex.md) | Symbolic vortex mapping system using numbers 1-12 for rotational and dimensional modeling in SDKP. |
| [How_to_Apply_SDKP_Framework.md](./How_to_Apply_SDKP_Framework.md) | Step-by-step instructions for applying the SDKP framework in simulations, hardware, and symbolic compression systems. |

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Notes

- Files are organized by concept and date.  
- Each disclosure includes materials, design schematics, physics theory, and prototype considerations.  
- Maintained by **Donald Paul Smith (FatherTimeSDKP)**.  
- DOI references for supporting data and Zenodo archives are provided in each disclosure.
